abstract: Bus carrying Duquesne men’s basketball becomes stranded on Pennsylvania Turnpike during East Coast blizzard, and is not freed for more than 22 hours.

headline.print_headline: Snow Angels and Twitter Cheer a Stranded Team
headline.main: Duquesne Basketball Team, Stuck on Turnpike, Plays Cards and Makes a Snow Angel

snippet: The bus carrying the men’s basketball team became stranded on the Pennsylvania Turnpike on Friday night and was not freed for more than 22 hours.
lead_paragraph: The bus carrying the men’s basketball team became stranded on the Pennsylvania Turnpike on Friday night and was not freed for more than 22 hours.
